SERI BERLIAN

AFFORDABLE LIVING IN TAMAN TASIK PRIMA, PUCHONG

• Seri Berlian is located at TAMAN TASIK PRIMA, PUCHONG within a 345-acre matured township.
• The surrounding area consists of high-end housing such as linked houses, bungalows, semidetached houses, condominiums, shop offices and amenities.
• Puchong features vast variety of bustling commercial centres, with modern amenities and facilities such as schools, hospitals, offices, hotels, shopping centres and hypermarkets.
• Close proximity to IOI Mall, LOTUS’s, and AEON BIG hypermarket and it lies within the Multimedia Super Corridor (MSC).
• Accessible to the major highways and expressways in the Klang Valley.
